Uses of Package
tum.dss.thesis.lsframework

  • Packages that use tum.dss.thesis.lsframework 
    Package Description
    tum.dss.thesis
    This package provides interfaces for the LS Framework as well as helper functions.
    tum.dss.thesis.knapsack
    This package is a concrete implementation of the LS framework for multi-unit auctions (respectively multi-parameter knapsack problems).
    tum.dss.thesis.lsframework
    This package contains all common functions and abstract classes for the LS framework, especially the ellipsoid method.
  • Classes in tum.dss.thesis.lsframework used by tum.dss.thesis 
    Class and Description
    EllipsoidMethodData
    Functions to handle the data used for the ellipsoid method, i.e. the mapping of different data structures.
  • Classes in tum.dss.thesis.lsframework used by tum.dss.thesis.knapsack 
    Class and Description
    AbstractItemsetHandler
    Abstract class to handle basic operations on itemsets.
    AbstractMechanism
    Class with various static methods to run a single iteration of the LS framework step by step.
    AbstractMechanismData
    Abstract mechanism data which handles basic player and item operations.
    AbstractPlayer
    Abstract player which implements basic methods to set valuations and retrieve valuation using an oracle access to maintain polynomial time.
    AbstractSeparationOracle
    Abstract separation oracle which implements all common functions among different algorithms.
    AbstractSimulation
    Abstract simulation class to run multiple instances of a mechanism with different parameters.
    EllipsoidMethodData
    Functions to handle the data used for the ellipsoid method, i.e. the mapping of different data structures.
  • Classes in tum.dss.thesis.lsframework used by tum.dss.thesis.lsframework 
    Class and Description
    AbstractMechanism
    Class with various static methods to run a single iteration of the LS framework step by step.
    AbstractMechanismData
    Abstract mechanism data which handles basic player and item operations.
    EllipsoidMethod
    Basic ellipsoid method basically suitable for all kinds of problems.
    EllipsoidMethodData
    Functions to handle the data used for the ellipsoid method, i.e. the mapping of different data structures.
    IntegerSolution
    Class to save all information about an integer solution including some analysis data.
